title: How Running A Business Changes The Way You Think
author: Patrick McKenzie
dek: This article explores how running a business alters one's thinking, focusing on the author's personal journey and how understanding his own motivations—specifically, the desire for praise—shaped his career path from high-achieving student to software entrepreneur.  He contrasts this intrinsic motivation with a more extrinsic lack of interest in money itself, viewing financial success as a score in a game rather than an ultimate goal.
